content:
There are many companies and tour operators in Oman that offer guided hikes and tours to Wadi Shab. Here are a few options that you can consider:

1. Adventure Leisure Tourism: They offer various packages for Wadi Shab tour, including transportation, hiking guides, and lunch. 2. Nomad Tours: They offer private guided hikes to Wadi Shab, including transportation, lunch, and swimming gear. 3. Oman Tours: They offer a full-day guided tour to Wadi Shab, including transportation, lunch, and a visit to the Bimmah sinkhole. 4. Oman Day Tours: They offer a guided tour to Wadi Shab and other popular destinations in Oman, including transportation and lunch. Of course, there are many other tour operators you can choose from based on your preferences and budget. But these should be a good starting point for you.
